body_html: That build command does not turn on lmdb. You will also have to pass -DUSE_LMDB=ON and also add lmdb to the conda dependencies https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/conda/caffe2/meta.yaml#L19 . lmdb is turned off by default b/c the dependency resolution of conda can sometimes pick a lmdb that leads to issues.
body_text: That build command does not turn on lmdb. You will also have to pass -DUSE_LMDB=ON and also add lmdb to the conda dependencies https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/conda/caffe2/meta.yaml#L19 . lmdb is turned off by default b/c the dependency resolution of conda can sometimes pick a lmdb that leads to issues.
body: That build command does not turn on lmdb. You will also have to pass -DUSE_LMDB=ON and also add lmdb to the conda dependencies https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/conda/caffe2/meta.yaml#L19 . lmdb is turned off by default b/c the dependency resolution of conda can sometimes pick a lmdb that leads to issues.
